title: Review Portfolio Asset Allocation
description: An advisor is conducting an annual review and needs to check if a client's portfolio allocation is aligned with their goals.

tasks.description: Retrieve the client's current portfolio holdings and their target asset allocation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the current holdings and the target (e.g., 70% equity, 30% fixed income).

tasks.description: Compare the current allocation to the target and identify any significant drift.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's analysis shows the portfolio has drifted to 75% equity due to market performance.

tasks.description: Present the findings to the advisor and suggest rebalancing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a summary of the allocation drift and recommends rebalancing trades.
